description.author: Michael Snoyman, Kazu Yamamoto, Matt Brown
description.synopsis: A fast, light-weight web server for WAI applications.
description.description: API docs and the README are available at <http://www.stackage.org/package/warp>.

package-flags.name: allow-sendfilefd
package-flags.description: Allow use of sendfileFd (not available on GNU/kFreeBSD)

package-flags.name: warp-debug
package-flags.description: print debug output. not suitable for production
